title: Chocolate Cake
steps: Melt the butter. Whisk eggs and sugar. Mix flour and cocoa. Bake at 180째C for 30 minutes.

title: Vanilla Ice Cream
steps: Boil cream and milk with vanilla pod. Whisk sugar into eggs. Mix egg mixture into cream. Freeze for 4 hours.

title: Apple Cake
ingredients: 4 apples. 200g sugar. 100g butter. 100g flour. 1 teaspoon cinnamon.
steps: Slice the apples. Mix sugar, butter, flour, and cinnamon. Place apples in a baking dish and cover with the dough. Bake at 180째C for 25 minutes.

title: Lemon Mousse
steps: Whisk cream and sugar together. Add lemon juice and eggs. Freeze for 3 hours.

title: Chocolate Fondant
ingredients: 200g dark chocolate. 100g butter. 2 eggs. 100g sugar. 50g flour.
steps: Melt the chocolate and butter. Whisk eggs and sugar. Mix the chocolate mixture with flour. Bake at 200째C for 10-12 minutes.

title: Strawberry Trifle
steps: Slice the strawberries and chop the biscuits. Whisk the cream and mix with sugar. Layer strawberries, cream, and biscuits in a glass.

title: Coconut Macaroons
ingredients: 200g desiccated coconut. 100g sugar. 2 eggs. 1 teaspoon vanilla sugar.
steps: Whisk eggs and sugar. Add coconut and vanilla sugar. Shape into small balls and bake at 180째C for 10-12 minutes.

title: Banana Ice Cream
steps: Slice the bananas and freeze them. Whisk the cream and pour over the frozen bananas. Melt the chocolate and pour over. Freeze for 2 hours.

title: Pear Sorbet
steps: Slice the pears and boil them with sugar and water. Blend the mixture and freeze for 4 hours.

title: Caramel Popcorn
ingredients: 100g popcorn. 200g sugar. 100g butter. 1 teaspoon vanilla sugar.
steps: Make the popcorn. Melt sugar and butter together. Add popcorn and vanilla sugar. Let the caramel set.

title: Chocolate Crepes
steps: Make pancakes with flour, eggs, and milk. Melt the chocolate and pour over the pancakes.
